timeline.message: Chore(JS): Run ESLint on UI code
Fix(JS): Change ESLint line-length rule to match Java
Fix(JS): Run 'npm audit fix' after updates

timeline.bodyText: These empty spaces are strange, do you know why they were inserted?
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Looks like they were there in the original, but ESLint wants it to be explicit?
replies.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: The dive has space before an after the cellContent so the linter to preserve those whitespace characters added the {' '} code to preserve the spacing
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: Interesting that no tag name is needed here.
timeline.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: Yes. I looked into this and the "shorthand notation" is preferred. <> is equivalent to <Fragment>.
replies.author: gkillough
